name: Chymeria: Wonder Quest Pre-alpha(DEMO)
description:
There is a world ruled by hybrid creatures known as "chymeria". Beings with unique abilities and traits. In this story you are a young explorer seeking answers to the strange phenomena's occurring around the world. Mix'n Match your chymeria, Make friends; who can help you on your travels, fight hostiles, and solve mysteries!(This is the pre-alpha DEMO build of the game. I'd really appreciate feedback as well, so it can help me improve the game! ^^)

Made in RPG Maker VX Ace.
